channel.title: Reading on Eric S. Moore

item.title: The Lathe of Heaven
item.description: I hardly ever remember my dreams, and when I do, itâ€™s never much more than a simple image or an impression of some weird random moment. Endless questions follow. Where did the rest of the dream go, if it ever was? Where do I go? What does it mean that I never dream vividly? And of course, what could our dreams possibly mean? If I, like Orr, dreamt effectively, would reality become a haze of confusion and unfinished sentences?
